self.name: Copy of Create Security Group Introduction

object.name: Copy of Create Security Group Introduction
object.description: An interactive form explaining the Create a Security Group in Active Directory workflow to the user.

config.description:
This interactive workflow creates a new Active Directory security group.

You will be asked to provide the following group details using an interactive form:

Name

Managed By

Group Type

Location

The group manager will receive a notification once the group has been created.

Note: The group name must be unique.
config.label: Introduction

self.name: Copy of New Security Group Details

object.name: Copy of New Security Group Details
object.description: An interactive form that allows the user to provide details for the security group they are creating in Active Directory.

formInput.label: locations
formInput.description: List of Organizational Unit objects fetched via a PAG.

config.helpText: Enter a unique name for the group. This name will be used for the SAM Account Name and Display Name.
config.label: Name

config.helpText: Select the user to set as the group manager. They will receive a notification once the group is created.
config.label: Managed By

config.helpText: Select the type of security group to create.
config.label: Type

config.helpText: Select the organizational unit to create the group in.
config.label: Location

config.helpText: Provide the manager's email address.
config.label: {{ $.form.input.comment }}

object.name: Create Security Group Introduction
object.description: An interactive form explaining the Create a Security Group in Active Directory workflow to the user.

usedBy.name: Template: Create a Security Group in Active Directory

config.description:
This interactive workflow creates a new Active Directory security group.

You will be asked to provide the following group details using an interactive form:

Name

Managed By

Group Type

Location

The group manager will receive a notification once the group has been created.

Note: The group name must be unique.
config.label: Introduction

self.name: Enter ID to add to Legacy UserID

object.name: Enter ID to add to Legacy UserID
object.description: Should be used by launched workflow

config.description: **NOTE ** This action is atypical. It is ONLY desirable when the sAMAccountName of an Identity is being changed from a prior value, e.g. due to certain types of User Type conversions - in which case we will no longer have the prior value stored on the identity for future exclusion on other identities.
config.label: Warning

config.helpText: After submitting this task a new record will be added to the LegacyUserId source to prevent this value from being used in future when issuing a new sAMAccountName/UserId
config.label: Enter UserID/sAMAccountName to add to future exclusion list
